EventHandlers
Class SaveListener

java.lang.Object
  EventHandlers.SaveListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SaveListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

An object of this class listens to presses of the "Save" item menu of the "File" menu.

Field Summary

          A reference to the main user interface where the graph is stored.

Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
This method is called when the "Save" menu item is called from the "File" menu. It requests from the user a location and name for the file. This file will store all the information of the graph.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
Parameters:
actionEvent - Not used.
